greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of Product_{m>=1} (1 + m*q^m)^-4.
link: Robert Israel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..3000
mathematica: With[{nmax = 50}, CoefficientList[Series[Product[(1 + k*q^k)^-4, {k, 1, nmax}], {q, 0, nmax}], q]] (* _G. C. Greubel_, Jul 19 2018 *)
program: (PARI) m=50; q='q+O('q^m); Vec(prod(n=1,m,(1+n*q^n)^-4)) \\ _G. C. Greubel_, Jul 19 2018
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
